turkish_example_sentence: O yaşlı profesör her gün kütüphanede sessizce felsefe düşünür.
english_example_sentence: That old professor thinks about philosophy silently in the library every day.
russian_example_sentence: Тот пожилой профессор каждый день молча думает о философии в библиотеке.
